Actions.Name: Rake
Actions.Effects: [name] can fly to any point on the line after the ability resolves. Foes in the area must save or be dazed.

Actions.Name: Pinions
Actions.Description: Deal 2 damage three times to a foe in range. Reduce this damage by one instance for every ally of that foe in range 2 of them.

Actions.Name: Swoop
Actions.Description: Leave the battlefield. Return to the battlefield in a visible free space at the end of the very next player turn with stealth.
